name: Meatsock
description:
WASD to move, left click to use the hacker, right click to zoom, walk into lockers to hide, hit E to get out of them, spacebar while aiming at a ledge with a green thingy to climb to that ledge. If a thing clamps onto your head you can click the green things to kill it.

CREDITS:

music by maxstack

ambience and various sound effects by qubodup
